name: Fueling the Future
title: Fossil Fuel Dependency
description: In 2022, Azerbaijan's energy consumption was entirely dependent on fossil fuels, marking a 100% reliance rate, the highest globally.

name: Safety Net Shortfall
title: Inadequate Social Insurance
description: As of 2015, only 24.26% of Azerbaijan's welfare was covered by social insurance programs, indicating a significant gap in social safety nets.

name: Helping the Needy
title: Targeted Social Benefits
description: In 2015, 15.92% of Azerbaijan's social insurance benefits were directed towards the poorest quintile, showcasing a targeted approach to welfare distribution.

name: Smoke-Free Females
title: Low Female Tobacco Use
description: In 2022, only 0.1% of adult females in Azerbaijan were reported to use tobacco, one of the lowest rates worldwide.
